Magsafe Macbook Power Adaptor Repair

MODELS: Magsafe 1 and 2

We offer repair services to Authentic Magsafe Power Adaptor Chargers with a Seven Day Warranty

These services will replace the old cable with a authentic Apple cable that is certified to not be a fire hazard.
